---
title: "Introduction"
---

__cli-kit__ is a toolkit for building Node.js-based command line applications. At it's core is a modern, efficient architecture that allows extensibility while preserving flexibility. Use as much or as little as you need.

## Features

 * Simple, elegant API
 * Efficient, dynamic, asynchronous [command line parsing](/docs/parsing)
 * [Commands](/docs/commands) and subcommands
 * Auto-generated [help](/docs/help)
 * Embed other CLI's using [extensions](/docs/extensions)
 * [Hooks](/docs/hooks) for custom event handling
 * [Template](/docs/templates) engine for CLI's
 * Automatic banner rendering
 * Standardized [error handling](/docs/error-handling)

Next, [Get Started](/docs/getting-started)!
